revised_title: The Effects of a Remarkable Spring on Health and Worms
tldr: The author describes a remarkable spring near Paderborn, Germany, with two streams of water having different properties. Drinking one stream's water causes death within days, while the other stream's water kills worms in the belly without harming the person. Mixing the two streams creates a third water with similar properties to the spring. This discovery could potentially lead to natural remedies for health issues.
